info.author: Luciano Bello
info.description:
At the moment, the module is mainly focus in authors information (aka
citations).

Search for authors (e.g. called "Bello" working for "Chalmers University"):
 >>> import scholar
 >>> l=scholar.searchAuthor('Bello Chalmers').next()
 >>> l.name
 <<< u'Luciano Bello'

Fetch all the infmation of an author:
 >>> l.fillIn()
 >>> l.affiliation
 <<< u'PhD Student of Computer Science, Chalmers University of Technology'

Get an author by id:
 >>> b=scholar.Author('L9Rk-_sAAAAJ')
 >>> b.fillIn()
 >>> b.citationIndex.all
 <<< 15

info.name: GoogleScholar
info.html_description:
At the moment, the module is mainly focus in authors information (aka citations).

Search for authors (e.g. called “Bello” working for “Chalmers University”):
>>> import scholar
>>> l=scholar.searchAuthor('Bello Chalmers').next()
>>> l.name
<<< u'Luciano Bello'
Fetch all the infmation of an author:
>>> l.fillIn()
>>> l.affiliation
<<< u'PhD Student of Computer Science, Chalmers University of Technology'
Get an author by id:
>>> b=scholar.Author('L9Rk-_sAAAAJ')
>>> b.fillIn()
>>> b.citationIndex.all
<<< 15
